title: Plum
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pan Asian fusion restaurant with a sushi bar and full bar. Serves Americanized Chinese, Thai, Japanese dishes. Vegan menu items are clearly marked, and you could also ask for the vegan menu. Note that the tofu is cooked in oil where meat is cooked, so ask to substitute steamed tofu. The restaurant sits in a modern building, seating area is wide open with a 2-story ceiling.
